phases.title: 1. Persiapan Alat Tempur
phases.description: Siapkan environment sebelum coding agar tidak ada friction teknis.

tasks.label: Pilih & Install IDE AI
tasks.details: Rekomendasi: Cursor ($20/mo) untuk best experience, atau VS Code + Antigravity (Free) untuk pemula.

tasks.label: Pilih Mode Kerja IDE
tasks.details: Chat (diskusi), Inline (autocomplete), Vision (review UI), atau Agentic (auto).

tasks.label: Tentukan Model AI Utama
tasks.details: Gemini Flash (Gratis) untuk quick task, Claude Sonnet (Balanced), Claude Opus (Complex reasoning).

tasks.label: Pahami Kriteria Pemilihan Model
tasks.details: Planning/Agentic → Claude Opus. Coding → Gemini Pro. Debugging → GPT/o1.

tasks.label: Setup MCP: Research Tools
tasks.details: Install 'context7' (fetch docs terbaru) dan 'firecrawl' (scrape web).

tasks.label: Setup MCP: Browser Testing
tasks.details: Install 'chrome-devtools' untuk auto-testing dan inspect DOM.

tasks.label: Setup MCP: Database (Optional)
tasks.details: Install 'supabase' atau 'firebase' MCP jika pakai backend.

tasks.label: Buat File Rules Project
tasks.details: Buat .cursor/rules.md atau clinerules. Isinya: Do's, Don'ts, Tech Stack, References.

tasks.label: Pahami Prinsip Inti AI Coding
tasks.details: Human-in-the-Loop WAJIB. Plan → Small Tasks → Verify. Context > Prompting.

tasks.label: Pahami Klaim Tidak Realistis
tasks.details: AI TIDAK 100% replace dev. Kode AI SELALU butuh review. Tanpa verifikasi = -19% productivity.

phases.title: 2. Pahami Masalah (Discovery)
phases.description: Jangan langsung coding! Validasi dulu ide dan solusinya.

tasks.label: Brainstorming dengan AI (Step 1)
tasks.details: Gunakan Claude/Gemini dalam mode Thinking/Deep Research untuk generate ide awal.

tasks.label: Riset Realita (Step 2)
tasks.details: Pakai Grok/Gemini untuk cari testimoni user, review kompetitor di Reddit/X.

tasks.label: Validasi Data Pasar (Step 3)
tasks.details: Gunakan Perplexity untuk data tren, Google Trends, studi kasus.

tasks.label: Sintesis Jadi Dokumen (Step 4)
tasks.details: Rangkum hasil brainstorming jadi: Needs, Pains, Gains.

tasks.label: Identifikasi Needs (Fitur Wajib)
tasks.details: Apa fitur yang HARUS ada? Contoh: Login, Dashboard, Payment.

tasks.label: Identifikasi Pains (Masalah User)
tasks.details: Apa yang bikin user frustrasi? Contoh: Proses manual lambat, UI ribet.

tasks.label: Riset Kompetitor (5-10 website)
tasks.details: Screenshot website serupa, catat kekuatan & kelemahan masing-masing.

tasks.label: Validasi Tech Stack
tasks.details: Pilih teknologi yang feasible berdasarkan timeline, budget, dan skill level kamu.

phases.title: 3. Tulis Dokumentasi (PRD)
phases.description: Tulis rencana sebelum satu baris kode pun dibuat.

tasks.label: Buat Dokumen PRD.md
tasks.details: Isi: Overview, User Personas, User Stories, Tech Stack, Fitur Utama, Timeline.

tasks.label: Buat frontend.md (Reference Desain)
tasks.details: Panduan visual: Color palette, typography, component style.

tasks.label: Buat architecture.md
tasks.details: Struktur sistem: File structure, data flow, tech stack detail.

tasks.label: Update Rules dengan Konteks PRD
tasks.details: Tambahkan tech stack, code style, references ke rules.md.

tasks.label: Gambar Alur Sistem (Flowchart)
tasks.details: Proses bisnis end-to-end. Bisa pakai Mermaid atau coretan kertas.

tasks.label: Gambar User Flow & Journey
tasks.details: Dari landing → signup → use feature → exit.

tasks.label: Desain Data Schema
tasks.details: Struktur database/JSON. Definisi fields, types, constraints.

tasks.label: Pahami Context Engineering
tasks.details: 4 Pillars: Write, Select, Compress, Isolate context. Ini skill #1 AI 2026.

tasks.label: Siapkan Context File Reusable
tasks.details: Buat context-projectname.md untuk handoff antar session AI.

phases.title: 5. Eksekusi Coding (Dev)
phases.description: Saatnya menulis kode! Ikuti best practice agar bersih.

tasks.label: Pilih Strategi: Frontend/Backend First?
tasks.details: Small/MVP → Frontend First (UI + Mock Data). Complex → Backend First (API + Auth).

tasks.label: Setup Project Structure
tasks.details: Buat folder structure sesuai architecture.md.

tasks.label: Slicing Frontend/UI
tasks.details: Gunakan AI Vision untuk convert desain ke kode HTML/CSS/Component.

tasks.label: Implementasi Logic/API
tasks.details: Routing, Controller, Business Logic sesuai PRD.

tasks.label: Gunakan Prompting Best Practice
tasks.details: English first (hemat 30-50% token). Role prompting. Chain of thought.

tasks.label: Fetch Docs Terbaru via MCP
tasks.details: Stuck? Tanya context7: 'Fetch latest Next.js 15 App Router docs'.

phases.title: 6. Verifikasi & Testing
phases.description: Jangan percaya AI 100%. Cek, tes, dan validasi.

tasks.label: Self-Verification (Manual)
tasks.details: Coba sendiri: Apakah fitur jalan? Ada console error? Mobile responsive?

tasks.label: Run Linter & TypeScript Check
tasks.details: Pastikan eslint clean, ts-check pass, no warnings.

tasks.label: Auto Testing via MCP (Browser)
tasks.details: Minta AI run browser test: 'Test form submission flow via chrome-devtools'.

tasks.label: Security Check: Secrets & Input
tasks.details: Cek hardcoded secrets (gunakan env vars!). Sanitize user input (SQL Injection).

tasks.label: Human/AI Code Review
tasks.details: Minta AI review: 'Review this code for security vulnerabilities'.

tasks.label: Fix Loop: Iterate Until Pass
tasks.details: Run test → identify failure → share error → apply fix → repeat.

phases.title: 7. Deploy ke Public
phases.description: Launch aplikasi agar bisa diakses orang lain.

tasks.label: Pilih Platform Deploy
tasks.details: Frontend: Vercel/Netlify/Cloudflare. Backend: Railway/Supabase. VPS: Coolify/Dokploy.

tasks.label: Set Environment Variables
tasks.details: Pastikan semua secrets ada di env vars platform, bukan hardcode.

tasks.label: Cek HTTPS & Domain
tasks.details: SSL certificate aktif. Domain sudah connected.

tasks.label: Setup CI/CD (Optional)
tasks.details: GitHub Actions untuk auto-deploy saat push ke main.

phases.title: 8. Iterasi & Feedback
phases.description: Software is never done. Improve based on data.

tasks.label: Kumpulkan Feedback User
tasks.details: Tanya user langsung, baca support tickets, cek analytics.

tasks.label: Ukur Metrik Kunci
tasks.details: Signups, retention rate, revenue, NPS score.

tasks.label: Analisa Feedback dengan AI
tasks.details: Minta AI rangkum feedback jadi prioritized action plan untuk v2.

tasks.label: Kembali ke Phase 1 (Discovery)
tasks.details: Mulai cycle baru untuk fitur/improvement berikutnya.

phases.title: ⚠️ Fallback Plan (Jika AI Gagal)
phases.description: Langkah darurat ketika AI tidak memberikan hasil yang diharapkan.

tasks.label: Review Konteks yang Diberikan
tasks.details: Apakah context cukup lengkap? Tambahkan file/docs yang relevan.

tasks.label: Pecah ke Task Lebih Kecil
tasks.details: Task terlalu besar? Breakdown jadi sub-tasks.

tasks.label: Reset Conversation (Fresh Start)
tasks.details: Context terlalu panjang/corrupt? Mulai chat baru.

tasks.label: Switch Model AI
tasks.details: Claude stuck? Coba Gemini. Gemini stuck? Coba GPT.

tasks.label: Kerjakan Manual (AI sebagai Assistant)
tasks.details: Fallback terakhir: Tulis sendiri, minta AI bantu review/debug.
